text:
Company: Burke LLC  
Role: Postal Service Mail Carrier  

Company Background:  
Burke LLC is a forward-thinking company dedicated to fostering an inclusive workplace. We pride ourselves on valuing diversity and promoting equality in all aspects of our operations.

Job Type: Full-Time  

Job Description:  
We are seeking a dedicated and responsible Postal Service Mail Carrier to join our team. The successful candidate will be responsible for delivering mail promptly and accurately within assigned areas, ensuring community members receive their mail safely and efficiently.

Responsibilities:  
- Sort and deliver mail to homes and businesses along designated routes.  
- Collect outgoing mail and ensure proper handling.  
- Provide accurate and courteous customer service.  
- Maintain and operate mail delivery vehicles safely.  
- Keep detailed records of deliveries and collections.  

Qualifications and Experience Needed:  
- High school diploma or equivalent.  
- Valid driver’s license with a clean driving record.  
- Ability to work independently and manage time effectively.  
- Strong interpersonal skills and customer service experience.  
- Physical stamina to handle mail delivery tasks.  

Perks and Benefits:  
- Competitive salary ranging from $40,000 to $50,000 annually, based on experience and skills.  
- Comprehensive health, dental, and vision insurance.  
- Paid time off and holidays.  
- Retirement savings plan with employer match.  
- Opportunities for career advancement and professional development.  

Additional Information:  
We are passionate about creating opportunities for LGBTQ+ professionals to succeed in our team. Our workplace culture values diversity, with a particular emphasis on LGBTQ+ representation. We actively welcome and encourage applications from individuals of diverse sexual orientations and gender identities.

How to Apply:  
Interested candidates should submit their resume and cover letter through our online application portal. We look forward to reviewing your application.
